verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a bond-servant of God, <S%G2316><s%> and an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> for the faith <S%G4102><s%> of those chosen <S%G1588><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> which is according <S%G2596><s%> to godliness, <S%G2150><s%>

in the hope <S%G1680><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G893><s%> cannot <S%G893><s%> lie, <S%G893><s%> promised <S%G1861><s%> long <S%G5550><s%> ages <S%G5550><s%> ago, <S%G4253><s%>

but at the proper <S%G2398><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> manifested, <S%G5319><s%> [even] His word, <S%G3056><s%> in the proclamation <S%G2782><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> I was entrusted <S%G4100><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our Savior; <S%G4990><s%>

to Titus, <S%G5103><s%> my true <S%G1103><s%> child <S%G5043><s%> in a common <S%G2839><s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Savior. <S%G4990><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G5484><s%> I left <S%G620><s%> you in Crete, <S%G2914><s%> that you might set <S%G1930><s%> in order <S%G1930><s%> what remains, <S%G3007><s%> and appoint <S%G2525><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> in every <S%G2596><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> as I directed <S%G1299><s%> you,

[namely,] if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> be above <S%G410><s%> reproach, <S%G410><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> who <S%G4103><s%> believe, <S%G4103><s%> not accused <S%G2724><s%> of dissipation <S%G810><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> rebellion. <S%G506><s%>

For the overseer <S%G1985><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be above <S%G410><s%> reproach <S%G410><s%> as God's steward, <S%G3623><s%> not self-willed, not quick-tempered, not addicted <S%G3943><s%> to wine, <S%G3943><s%> not pugnacious, <S%G4131><s%> not fond <S%G146><s%> of sordid <S%G146><s%> gain, <S%G146><s%>
but hospitable, <S%G5382><s%> loving <S%G5358><s%> what <S%G5358><s%> is good, <S%G5358><s%> sensible, <S%G4998><s%> just, <S%G1342><s%> devout, <S%G3741><s%> self-controlled,

holding <S%G472><s%> fast <S%G472><s%> the faithful <S%G4103><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> which is in accordance <S%G2596><s%> with the teaching, <S%G1322><s%> that he may be able <S%G1415><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to exhort <S%G3870><s%> in sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%> and to refute <S%G1651><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who contradict. <S%G483><s%>

For there are many <S%G4183><s%> rebellious <S%G506><s%> men, <S%G506><s%> empty <S%G3151><s%> talkers <S%G3151><s%> and deceivers, <S%G5423><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> of the circumcision, <S%G4061><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be silenced <S%G1993><s%> because <S%G3748><s%> they are upsetting <S%G396><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> families, <S%G3624><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> things <S%G3739><s%> they should <S%G1163><s%> not [teach], for the sake <S%G5484><s%> of sordid <S%G150><s%> gain. <S%G2771><s%>

One <S%G5100><s%> of themselves, <S%G846><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%> of their own, <S%G2398><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Cretans <S%G2912><s%> are always <S%G104><s%> liars, <S%G5583><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> beasts, <S%G2342><s%> lazy <S%G692><s%> gluttons. <S%G1064><s%>"

This <S%G3778><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> is true. <S%G227><s%> For this <S%G3739><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> reprove <S%G1651><s%> them severely <S%G664><s%> that they may be sound <S%G5198><s%> in the faith, <S%G4102><s%>

not paying <S%G4337><s%> attention <S%G4337><s%> to Jewish <S%G2451><s%> myths <S%G3454><s%> and commandments <S%G1785><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> who turn <S%G654><s%> away <S%G654><s%> from the truth. <S%G225><s%>

To the pure, <S%G2513><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are pure; <S%G2513><s%> but to those <S%G3588><s%> who are defiled <S%G3392><s%> and unbelieving, <S%G571><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> is pure, <S%G2513><s%> but both <S%G2532><s%> their mind <S%G3563><s%> and their conscience <S%G4893><s%> are defiled. <S%G3392><s%>

They profess <S%G3670><s%> to know <S%G3609><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> but by [their] deeds <S%G2041><s%> they deny <S%G720><s%> [Him], being <S%G1510><s%> detestable <S%G947><s%> and disobedient, <S%G545><s%> and worthless <S%G96><s%> for any <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> deed. <S%G2041><s%>
